effects: Reduce damage taken from physical attacks taken by 30% to all allies for 3 turns

desc_short: Reduce physical damage taken for all allies for three turns
3回合內減少對全體隊員的物理傷害
3턴 동안 아군 전체가 받는 물리피해량 감소
